Texts.Chs: 只需要把这台^orange;FTL引擎^reset;放在飞船里你就可以进行星际旅行了。干得好，干员！
Texts.Eng: All you need to do is place that ^cyan;FTL Drive^reset; in your ship and you'll be able to travel between stars. Good work, agent!

Texts.Chs: 探索附近的卫星以寻找^pink;厄尔吉斯水晶^reset;
Texts.Eng: Explore a nearby moon to find ^pink;Erchius Crystals^reset;

Texts.Chs: 研究并制作一台^cyan;小型FTL引擎^reset;
Texts.Eng: Research and craft a ^cyan;Small FTL Drive^reset;

Texts.Chs: 研究并制作一台^cyan;小型STL引擎^reset;
欢迎回来，亲爱的。让我们把你的飞船修好，好吗？要去其他星球，你需要修复你的^cyan;FTL引擎^reset;。不过，首先要做的是。制造一台^orange;STL引擎^reset;，这样你就可以探索你所在的星系了。
Texts.Eng: Welcome back, dear. Let's get your ship fixed, shall we? To get to other stars you'll need to repair your ^cyan;FTL drive^reset;. First thing's first, though. Build an ^orange;STL drive^reset; so you can explore the system you're in.
